title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - World Update VIII - What to expect
description:
In this video we are going to look at what we can expect in World Update VIII.
Next week the next World Update for MSFS will be released, to be exact on the 22nd of March. In addition to this Local Hero III will be made available which is a paid add-on being available via the marketplace. In this video we will look at some screenshots already released and discuss about what to expect in the World Update including some guessing because not all details have been released yet.
